name: Shoot o' Treat
description:
A 2 month project

Was originally supposed to be released back in October, but some stuff happened and had to postpone the project.

Simple low poly FPS where you survive the waves of evil sugary delights.

Developed and Coded in C# and Unity

Assets from various stores (i.e. Sketchfab, Turbosquid, Unity Asset Store, Itchio store)
